snippet.title: Despot's Game - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Despot’s Game Early Access starts October 14 on Steam! Join the OPEN BETA TEST now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227280/Despots_Game/

Despot’s Game a rogue-like tactics with turbo-charged battles. Build your army of puny humans and sacrifice them while trying to escape the dungeon. 

FEATURES:

- Indirect combat -
Prepare your warriors and let them fight it out on their own! Indirect combat allows you to focus heavily on tactical considerations rather than reflexes;

- Endless exploration -
The dungeons are generated from scratch every time, and there is no chance for puny humans to find the way out!

- Asynchronous multiplayer -
Fight against armies of other players and compete in multiplayer challenges!

Join other puny humans:

Discord: https://discord.gg/Qa4HxzZfTX
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Despotism_3k
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DespotsGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/despotism3k/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DespotsGame/

#indiegame #indiegames #pixelart #roguelike #madewithunity #autochess #tinyBuild
